tool_description: The India Today Unofficial API is a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It allows developers to retrieve articles, videos, images, and other information related to various topics. Please note that it is not an official API provided by India Today.
name: India Today Unofficial
title: India Today Unofficial

api_list.name: Tag Search
api_list.description: Get news as per the tag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/news/India"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/news/{tag}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.title: Mini Cooper gets Kerala communist leader a drop-off from CPI(M)post
test_endpoint.content: CPI(M) has removed communist trade union leader, PK Anil Kumar, from official duties weeks after he bought a luxurious Mini Cooper worth Rs 50 lakh.

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.title: Adipurush Movie Review: Prabhas excels as Raghav but substandard VFX is a let-down
test_endpoint.content: Om Raut's epic Hindu saga, Adipurush, opened after many delays and amid a lot of hype. While the film was deemed worth the wait, our review suggests that its overall quality was marred by subpar VFX.

test_endpoint.title: Viral video: Monkey in theatre during Adipurush screening
test_endpoint.content: Adipurush released in theatres today, June 16. A monkey was spotted in one of the theatres playing the film, prompting fans to chant Jai Shri Ram.

test_endpoint.title: Lucknow man with VIP number-plate car steals goat; CCTV captures theft
test_endpoint.content: In an incident reported from the Gomti Nagar area in Lucknow, a man who came out of a car with a VIP number plate was caught on camera stealing a goat. Police are investigating the matter.

test_endpoint.title: Go First aims to resume operations by June-end, awaits DGCA approval
test_endpoint.content: Resuming flight operations won't be easy for Go First, and whether it will be allowed to fly will depend on the aviation regulator Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA).

test_endpoint.title: Mini Cooper gets Kerala communist leader a drop-off from CPI(M)post
test_endpoint.content: CPI(M) has removed communist trade union leader, PK Anil Kumar, from official duties weeks after he bought a luxurious Mini Cooper worth Rs 50 lakh.

test_endpoint.title: Trees uprooted, power outages in 940 Gujarat villages as storm weakens on way to Rajasthan
test_endpoint.content: Cyclone Biparjoy has now weakened into a 'severe' storm and will turn into a depression by today evening. The cyclone made its landfall in Gujarat yesterday evening, bringing heavy rainfall with strong winds and leaving several people injured. It is now on its way to Rajasthan and the weather office has warned of heavy rain in the state too.

test_endpoint.title: Groom punished by bride's family in Uttar Pradesh |Know why
test_endpoint.content: During the 'jai mala' ceremony, the friends of Amarjeet misbehaved, which led to a brawl between the families of the bride and groom.

test_endpoint.title: Trump promises 'food for everyone' at Miami restaurant, then leaves without paying: Report
test_endpoint.content: Former President Donald Trump made a short appearance at a Cuban restaurant in Little Havana after his court appearance on Thursday, where he promised 'food for everyone' present there. Though he was not taken seriously by many, people claimed they were disappointed after he left without delivering on his promise.

test_endpoint.title: Five planets to line up in sky: When and how to watch them
test_endpoint.content: The parade of planets is also called a conjunction, which takes place when two or more planets in our solar system appear to be in close proximity to each other when observed from Earth.

test_endpoint.title: Gurugram man gets scam call on WhatsApp, faints after seeing woman undressing on video call: Full story
test_endpoint.content: The victim was reportedly sitting with his father when he received a video call on WhatsApp from an unknown number. However, the moment he answered the call, he fainted in shock upon seeing a woman undressing.

test_endpoint.title: Lord Hanuman's idol, flowers placed on special seats at Prabhas' Adipurush screenings
test_endpoint.content: Director Om Raut's Adipurush, starring Prabhas, Kriti Sanon and Saif Ali Khan, released on June 16. In many theatres, a seat has been reserved for Lord Hanuman.

test_endpoint.title: In love with brother-in-law, UP woman kills husband, buries his body in toilet pit; arrested
test_endpoint.content: Police have arrested a woman and her lover in connection with her husband's murder in Uttar Pradesh's Muzaffarnagar. The victim went missing on June 6 and his body was found buried in a toilet pit at home.

test_endpoint.title: What came first - chicken or egg? The answer is...
test_endpoint.content: A new study is on the verge of answering this question, which has puzzled not just young minds but seasoned scholars across the world.

test_endpoint.title: Parents asleep, 5-year-old boy falls off balcony in Noida's high-rise society, dies
test_endpoint.content: A 5-year-old boy died after he fell off the balcony of an 8th-floor apartment in a high-rise group housing society in Noida on Friday.

test_endpoint.title: 'Religious leaders should stay in mutts': KCR says Centre involving 'dharma gurus' in politics
test_endpoint.content: KCR has accused the government of involving religious leaders in politics, stating that they should focus on running religious institutions and performing rituals instead. His comments came after the Law Commission sought the opinions of religious bodies on the Uniform Civil Code (UCC).

test_endpoint.title: Body parts kept at home, sold through mail. Details of how Harvard morgue manager committed crime
test_endpoint.content: Cedric Lodge, a former manager at the Harvard Medical School morgue and his wife were indicted in the theft and sale of human body parts.  Lodge took the body parts — which included heads, brains, skin and bones — back to his home and sold them through the mail.

test_endpoint.title: Sam Hargrave discusses his closeness with Chris Hemsworth
test_endpoint.content: Sam Hargrave discussed his closeness with Thor actor, Chris Hemsworth, in a recent interview. Their much-awaited Extraction sequel releases today, June 16, 2023.

test_endpoint.title: Bigg Boss OTT 2: When and where to watch, list of contestants and more
test_endpoint.content: Bigg Boss OTT Season 2 is all set to premiere on June 17. Ahead of that, here's everything you need to know.

test_endpoint.title: Why Adipurush's VFX looks like a poor copy of Game of Thrones and The Lord of the Rings
test_endpoint.content: Prabhas' Adipurush released on June 16. Here's why, the film will remind you of classic Hollywood shows and films.

test_endpoint.title: Viral video: Monkey in theatre during Adipurush screening
test_endpoint.content: Adipurush released in theatres today, June 16. A monkey was spotted in one of the theatres playing the film, prompting fans to chant Jai Shri Ram.
